title: Jess Shears lashes out at vile baby trolls after becoming a mother for first time

Love Island 's Jess Shears hit out at cruel baby trolls on social media on Sunday.

Earlier in the day, the new mum went public with her and Dom Lever's baby joy when she shared a picture of her newborn child for the first time on Instagram with her adoring fans.

The Love Island star set the record straight when she pointed out her child wasn't born on the same day she posted the social media image.

In an impassioned post, Jess insisted the family unit were "happy, healthy and recovering" in their own time.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

She wrote on Instagram: "Can people stop assuming they know anything about the birth of our child.

"Just because we chose to share an image yesterday does not mean that's when they were born.

"Dom, baby and I are happy, healthy and recovering at our own rate."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

It's an exciting time for Jess and Dom as they have become parents for the first time.

The couple were delighted to give their 1.3million fans just a glimmer into their new lives as parents to their newborn.

In one of the snaps, the smitten lovebirds put on a very cosy display as Jess wrapped her arms around Dom's neck.

Also, Jess showed off her incredibly flat post-baby stomach while she posed in a crop top for a social media video.

The happy pair fell for each other when they first crossed paths on the 2017 series of Love Island.

Despite bowing out of the series early, the couple's love for each other has blossomed off camera.
description: Love Island's Jess hit out at prying baby trolls in an impassioned Instagram post after sharing her happy news
